data.text: @destinedroads Hi Divya, please note, for assistance with check-in or re-issuance of boarding pass through our Customer Helpline, a facilitation fee of INR 200 per passenger will be charged. Further, there will not be any additional charges for re-issuance of boarding pass at the airport.

data.text: @JM_Scindia A big thank you Mr. @JM_Scindia for joining us as we inaugurate our exclusive flight from Pune to Bangkok.

@Ahamadba Hi Ahmed, kindly initiate a DM so we may assist you.

https://t.co/UMdB9lKlTP

@23Simba11 As checked, GST details are not updated in booking hence, we would not be able to share the invoice. Further, the cancellation fee shall be applicable in the booking. Our team shall assist you in this regard.

data.text: @pjoshi260 Hi Paras, please note that we always try our best to maintain departures as per schedule. However, at times, due to unavoidable reasons, we face changes. Kindly refer to point no. 24 (Domestic) on link https://t.co/TSWFxo248r for detailed information.
@LeslieG52257616 Hi Leslie, please note that the seat 18A has been allocated for Jaipur to Delhi flight. You can allocate the preferable seat for Delhi to Pune sector and complete the web check-in.

@iamvikashjha Hi Vikash, please note that the full refund of INR 6,636 has already been processed dated 02nd Nov'22 towards the same agency ID from which the payment was made. Kindly get in touch with the travel agency for your refund.
@mohdimr12741179 Hi Imran, kindly refer to the link https://t.co/au9oPPVpQB for passenger charter.

@bisnujha Hi Mr Jha, please note that the flight was rescheduled due to operational reasons. The information regarding the changes was shared via SMS/Email on the registered details in advance. Further, the passenger opted for an alternate flight.
@suntasticcc Hello Suraj, please note that the flight SG 8187 dated 13th Nov'22 shall depart from terminal 3.
https://t.co/bhyyGLmDU5

urls.title: SpiceJet
urls.description: Our employees are trained to assist our differently-abled passengers and for any sorts of limitations, we offer a wide variety of special assistance. You can obtain information in advance regarding the assistance we offer, either through this website or by contacting our Reservations on +91-124-4983410 / +91-124-7101600. Please be aware that there might be unpredictable circumstances such as weather or mechanical problems that may call for a last minute unavoidable change, but we will do our best to

data.text: @roy_shoubhik Kindly refer to the point no. 14 on link https://t.co/Lv4Z2JhDPx and proceed accordingly.
@beingakg Hi Ankit, as checked, our team has shared a response via email yesterday. Please check and revert back to the same email correspondence for further assistance.
@roy_shoubhik Shoubhik, please note, per passenger, one piece of hand baggage of up to 7kg is allowed and the same cannot be clubbed. Passengers may club their check-in baggage.
@fernsxruben You're welcome!
@roy_shoubhik Hi Shoubhik, please allow us a moment.
@fernsxruben Yes, the same is applicable for domestic flights as well.

@fernsxruben Hi Ruben, passengers traveling under the same PNR can club their check-in bags only. Also note, that each bag must not exceed 32 kg as per airport baggage restrictions. Further, kindly refer to our website https://t.co/7pLHRPUeg6 Point 17.

@girishbajaj28 Hi Girish, as checked, full refund for your booking(PNR: LIYWNH) has already been processed towards the same agency ID from which the booking was done dated 10th Sep'22. Please get in touch with them for refund claims, they shall refund as per their own terms of the contract.
https://t.co/nIE1YpyvxT
